title: The Socially Viable Self

panel_structure.description: Fractured mirror showing multiple selves, the 'normal' mask in center cracking to reveal authentic layers beneath—some beautiful, others challenging, all more real
Kaleidoscopic explosion of identity fragments contrasting social conformity with authentic expression, showing how the socially viable self is carefully constructed performance

transformation_notes: The mirror becomes a tool for revealing how our 'normal' self is often our most constructed identity—designed for social acceptance rather than authentic expression.
